description: From mocking +‎ bird, from the ability of the birds to mimic sounds and, in some cases, hum as a wake up call.

entries.meaning: A long-tailed American songbird of the Mimidae family, noted for its ability to mimic calls of other birds.
(archaic) Synonym of tui (“a species of honeyeater, Prosthemadera novaeseelandiae, a bird which is endemic to New Zealand”)
